verses.verse: In my distress<WH6869> I cried<WH7121> unto the Lord<WH3068>, and he heard me<WH6030>.
Deliver<WH5337> my soul<WH5315>, O Lord<WH3068>, from lying<WH8267> lips<WH8193>, and from a deceitful<WH7423> tongue<WH3956>.
What shall be given<WH5414> unto you<WH3254>? or what shall be done unto you<WH7423>, you false tongue<WH3956>?
Sharp<WH8150> arrows<WH2671> of the mighty<WH1368>, with coals<WH1513> of juniper<WH7574>.
Woe<WH190> is me<WH1481>, that I live in Mesech<WH4902>, that I live<WH7931> in the tents<WH168> of Kedar<WH6938>!
My soul<WH5315> has long<WH7227> lived<WH7931> with him that hates<WH8130> peace<WH7965>.
I am for peace<WH7965>: but when I speak<WH1696>, they are for war<WH4421>.
